history.proof: intros H. unfold Lim. srun best use: Lim_seq_ext.

exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R x : Rbar H : forall y : R, f y = g y Unable to unify "f ?M2367 = g ?M2367" with "match x with | Finite a => locally' a (fun y : R => f y = g y) | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> (fun y : R => f y = g y) x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> (fun y : R => f y = g y) x end".

original: intros H. unfold Lim. unfold Lim_seq. unfold Rbar_loc_seq. apply Lim_ext_loc. intros. apply H.
